node.title: 'We miss you Mommy': What is happening with Monaco's Princess Charlene?
node.alt: Part of Monaco's Royal family in formal dress, watching Monaco's National Day celebrations
node.description: Princess Charlene's long-awaited return to Monaco is cut short ahead of major celebrations in the wealthy nation. Here's what we know about it.
node.content:
["She's the glamorous princess and former Olympian who married Monaco's\u00a0Prince Albert II a decade ago.", "But Princess Charlene's battle with poor health is back in the spotlight after she missed a key event for the first time.", "Here's what we know about it.", "
Why is it in the news now?
", "These are the\u00a0heart-wrenching pictures, taken during Monaco's National Day last Friday.\u00a0", "Prince Albert and Princess Charlene's six-year-old twins,\u00a0Princess\u00a0Gabriella and Hereditary Prince\u00a0Jacques are\u00a0holding handmade signs saying, \"We miss you Mommy\" and \"Love you Mommy\".", "", "
The family celebrating Monaco's National Day\u00a0without Princess Charlene.(Daniel Cole: AP Photo)
", "Princess Charlene hasn't missed a National Day celebration in the small country since her first appearance after her engagement in 2010.", "The palace said on Tuesday that\u00a0she's suffering from deep fatigue and will need several weeks to recover away from the public eye.", "But it came just one week\u00a0after the princess made a publicised\u00a0return from spending around six months in South Africa.", "Around the same time as those pictures on the balcony,\u00a0an exclusive interview was published in\u00a0People magazine with Prince Albert.", "He told the magazine that his 43-year-old wife was in a treatment facility \"outside of Monaco\" and that her return from South Africa had gone \"pretty well in the first few hours, and then it became pretty evident that she was unwell\".", "A palace spokesperson has confirmed the interview was genuine but\u00a0they had no further comment to make.", "
What happened in\u00a0South Africa?
", "In May this year, Princess Charlene went to South Africa to support anti-poaching charities.", "The palace said she contracted an ear, nose and throat infection while there that didn't allow her to travel.", "The unspecified infection needed several surgeries over many months, and Prince Albert told People that\u00a0there were some \"consequences of her different surgeries and the procedures she underwent.\"", "\"That certainly was a factor, but at this point, I prefer not to comment further. I can say she was suffering incredible fatigue. She hadn't slept well in a number of days and she wasn't eating at all well.", "The princess missed her 10th wedding anniversary in July, but her family did visit her during her time away, with pictures posted to social media of a family reunion in August.", "
Why the speculation about their marriage?
", "On Princess Charlene's latest move to a treatment facility, Albert told People magazine: \"I'm probably going to say this several times, but this has nothing to do with our relationship. I want to make that very clear.\u00a0", "But before their marriage in 2011, there had been\u00a0rumours their\u00a0relationship was on the verge of collapse and media reports at the time suggested she tried to leave Monaco\u00a0days before the\u00a0wedding.", "The couple had\u00a0filed a lawsuit against a French magazine they claim spread false rumours of discord ahead of their wedding.", "Before her marriage, the princess had swum at the Sydney Olympics, representing South Africa and met her future husband at a swimming meet.", "The family has asked for privacy while she recovers, and the princess\u00a0has temporarily withdrawn from public duty.", "ABC/wires"]
